name: crud_api_integration_usingjavascript
description: How to integrate API in your application using Javascript and fetch method. <!--  1. Node version: 12.18.4 2. JSON server - install JSON server (https://www.npmjs.com/package/json-server, https://github.com/typicode/json-server)     - npm init     - npm install json-server     - Create file db.json in api folder with json format.     - Start JSON Server: json-server --watch db.json     config start json server:     In package.json add ["start": "json-server --watch db.json",]     On terminal: [npm start] -->
